use_cases.title: Password meets all strength requirements
use_cases.goal: Verify that a password meeting all strength requirements is accepted
preconditions: User is on the signup page
steps: Enter a valid email in the email field
Enter 'Valid$Password1' in the confirm password field
expected_results: No password strength error message is displayed
boundary_cases: Password with exactly 8 characters meeting all other requirements
Password with exactly 128 characters meeting all other requirements

use_cases.title: Password does not meet minimum strength requirements
use_cases.goal: Validate that a weak password is rejected
preconditions: User is on the signup page
steps: Enter a valid email in the email field
Enter 'weak' in the confirm password field
expected_results: "Password must be at least 8 characters and contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character" error message is displayed

use_cases.title: Password on the boundary of minimum and maximum length
use_cases.goal: Ensure password validation correctly handles boundary lengths
preconditions: User is on the signup page
steps: First, enter a password with exactly 8 characters that meets all other criteria
Next, enter a password with exactly 128 characters that meets all other criteria

assumptions: Assuming that the system correctly displays error messages as per the user's input
